scripts.start: ./docker-compose.sh && docker compose rm -f && docker compose up --build --remove-orphans
scripts.dashboard:server:build: esbuild lib/dashboard/server/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/dashboard/server --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.bootstrap:build: esbuild lib/bootstrap/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/bootstrap --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --external:better-sqlite3 --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.peer:build: esbuild lib/peer/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/peer --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --external:@canvas-js/okra-lmdb --external:better-sqlite3 --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.server:build: esbuild lib/server/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/server --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --external:@canvas-js/okra-lmdb --external:better-sqlite3 --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.relay:build: esbuild lib/relay/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/relay --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
